question: Who of the following is the world's highest-earning cricket coach?
explanation: Indian cricket team coach Ravi Shastri is the world's highest-earning cricket coach in the world. He is paid around 1.17 million dollars per year from the BCCI which is more than the salary of Indian cricket team's captain Virat Kohli. Next to Ravi Shastri, the Australia coach Darren Lehmann who earns aroiund $0.55 million.
